attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition to keep Bedford Hospital Paediatric Department open and available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week!

This will mean that the GMC (General Medical Council) will need to re-consider its decision to pull out all junior doctors and trainees from the department due to issues that have been resolved!

In order for the GMC to reconsider their action, those of us signing this petition would like the Department of Health to really look at the ramifications of closing down the Inpatient and Ambulatory Services offered by Bedford Hospital Paediatric Department and how it will affect the community and the safety of the children of Bedford.

Please sign this Petition if you believe that the Government should help keep the Paediatric Department at Bedford Hospital open to help children.
